{{Infobox Berry |name = #59 Maranga |image = [[File:Maranga.png]] |caption = This Berry resembles the Durin Berry, however its spikes are less pronounced. It is quite delicious when roasted. |growtime = 11h 12m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 3100 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *35 sweet *30 bitter *10 sour }} '''Maranga''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Salac]] and at least 1 [[Petaya]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 24 mins || 2 hours 48 mins || 5 hours 36 mins || 11 hours 12 mins - 22 hours 24 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MarangaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MarangaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MarangaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Maranga berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] || || || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || || || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] || |- | || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] || || || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |} {{Berries}}
